<js>
let url=surl()+java.hexDecodeToString(result);
let webr=cache.get(url)+'';
if (webr.length<6999) {
webr=java.ajax(url);
webr=rrcheck(url, webr);
if (/animation_list\/all/.test(url))
cache.put(url,webr,3600*24*3);
else if (/content_news\/all|fc_search\/all/.test(url))
cache.put(url,webr,3600*24*2);
else if (/uncensored_list\/all/.test(url))
cache.put(url,webr,3600*24);
else
cache.put(url,webr,3600*4);
} else {
	let mk=cache.getFromMemory(url+'2')||0;
	cache.putMemory(url+'2',mk+1);
	let tmh = new Date().getHours();
	if (/content_news\/all|animation_list\/all|fc_search\/all/.test(url)) {mk>3&&cache.delete(url);}
	else if (mk>1||tmh>1&&tmh<4) {
		cache.deleteMemory(url+'2');
		cache.delete(url);}
}
webr = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webr);
webr.select('.posts>.post')
</js>
ruleContent:
let uu=java.hexDecodeToString(result)+''; result=uu.replace(/[\/\.\_\-\s]|html$/g,''); let ssurl = surl(); let url = ssurl + uu; let webr=cache.get(url)+''; if (webr.length<6999) { webr = java.ajax(url); webr = rrcheck(url, webr); cache.put(url,webr,3600*24*20);} let pimg = gets('#player-wrap img@src', webr); let yimgs = gets('.ut1_img_content_smallcg@html', webr); let jianjie = gets('.posts-inner-details-text,.actor-right-details-images,.posts-inner-details-text@html', webr).replaceAll('https://pics.','http://cdn.cdnjson.com/pic.html?url=pics.'); let srcurl = source.get('av18' + result) + ''; if (!srcurl) { java.toast('è§£å¯†æœ¬ç‰‡é“¾æ¥ä¸­'); let webjs = ` jfun_show_vfc(); $('body .main .container_small center').html()`; try { webr = java.webView(webr, url, webjs); } catch(err) {webr='';} srcurl = webr.match(/\/\/[^"']+js\/player\/[^"']+php\?id=100_([^"'_]+)_([^"']+)/); if (srcurl) { srcurl = `/${srcurl[1]}/${srcurl[2]}/${srcurl[2]}.m3u8`; source.put('av18' + result, srcurl); } } if (!srcurl||!pimg) { cache.delete(url); java.longToast('ğŸ’”æœªè·å–åˆ°æ’­æ”¾é“¾æ¥'); result='';} else { if (/18av\.mm\-/.test(ssurl)) srcurl = "https://v.imgstream2.com"+ srcurl; else srcurl = ssurl.replace('//', '//fc.') + srcurl; let lianjie=source.get('avæ˜¾ç¤ºé“¾æ¥')!=2? `

æ’­æ”¾é“¾æ¥ï¼š${srcurl}

`:''; let pyer=source.get('avå¤–ç½®æ’­æ”¾å™¨')==1; if (pyer) java.openUrl(srcurl,'video/*'); // è®¾ç½®Cookie let cks=(source.getLoginHeader()+'').split(/;\s*/); let ckjs=''; for (let ck of cks) { if (ck) ckjs+=`document.cookie = "${ck}; path=/"; `;} result=` ${rssArticle.sort}
